DataElement.preferredName: Target Lesion Prior Irradiated Field Present Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to area of abnormal tissue which is the goal areas being present in area which was formerly treated with radiation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Target Lesion Prior Irradiated Field Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to area of abnormal tissue which is the goal areas being present in area which was formerly treated with radiation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The goal intended to be attained.:(LEE-zhun) An area of abnormal tissue change.

Concepts.definition: An object fixed as a goal or point of examination; something to point at; a destination.
A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Treated with radiation.:The region in which a particular type of force can be observed, often viewed as a space which was modified by the sources of the force which the field represents.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: The region in which a particular type of force can be observed, often viewed as a space which was modified by the sources of the force which the field represents.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
